content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace at position(-5, -65)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position -5, -65)
- Burner mining drill (position 47, -82)
- Wooden chest (position 46.5, -83.5)
- Wooden chest (position 48.5, -83.5)
- Wooden chest (position 5.5, -79.5)
- Wooden chest (position 10.5, -79.5)

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position 0.5, 0.5)
- Boiler (position 0.5, 6.0)
- Pipe groups connecting the boiler and steam engine

### Copper plate factory
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position -5, -65) connected to:
  - Burner mining drill (position 47, -82)
  - Wooden chest (position 46.5, -83.5)
- Belt group connecting the furnace to the output

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting Boiler and Steam Engine
- Ensure you have enough pipes in your inventory to connect the Boiler and Steam Engine. Check your inventory before attempting to connect.

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Ensure that the Offshore Pump is in your inventory before attempting to place it. Check your inventory status before placement.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the target position.
